code: import React,{useState,useContext}from"react";import emoji from"react-easy-emoji";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import"./ToggleSwitch.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToggleSwitch=()=>{const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);const[isChecked,setChecked]=useState(isDark);const styleContext=useContext(StyleContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:isDark,onChange:()=>{styleContext.changeTheme();setChecked(!isChecked);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"slider round",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"emoji",children:isChecked?emoji("üåú"):emoji("‚òÄÔ∏è")})})]});};export default ToggleSwitch;
